author: Fextralife
description:
Lies of P: Overture DLC Review - A Legendary Prequel
In this Lies of P Overture review, we're going to be taking a deep dive into the latest shadow drop DLC for Lies of P. I've been pretty hyped for this launch ever since it was announced 3 months ago, and was pleasantly surprised when they released it a full month before their summer release window. Does this DLC live up to the grandeur of the original Belle Epoque Souls? Watch on to find out.

https://liesofp.wiki.fextralife.com/Lies+of+P+Wiki
https://fextralife.com/lies-of-p-review/

0:00 - Lies of P Overture Review

3:58 - Gameplay
6:55 - Design, Audio, and Visual
7:42 - Replayability and Pricepoint
8:55 - Final Thoughts & Review Score
